Clip.Title: THE VACCINE ACCORDING TO BILL GATES
Clip.Episode: The Vaccine According to Bill Gates
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Malaria kills between one and three million people each year, and almost 500 million are contaminated with the disease throughout the world. For the past 80 years, researchers have been unsuccessful at finding a cure. However, we may be about to witness a breakthrough.

Clip.Title: KURU: SCIENCE AND THE SORCERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An Australian researcher discovers the cause of a crippling plague in New Guinea, and finds how the affliction the isolated tribe suffers from became a global concern.

Clip.Title: BAD BLOOD: A CAUTIONARY TALE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how a 'miracle' treatment became an agent of death, and how a community launched a fight to right the system that failed them to make it safer for all.

Clip.Title: THE VACCINE ACCORDING TO BILL GATES

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Malaria kills between one and three million people each year, and almost 500 million are contaminated with the disease throughout the world. For the past 80 years, researchers have been unsuccessful at finding a cure. However, we may be about to witness a breakthrough.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: THE VACCINE ACCORDING TO BILL GATES
Clip.Episode: The Vaccine According to Bill Gates
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Malaria kills between one and three million people each year, and almost 500 million are contaminated with the disease throughout the world. For the past 80 years, researchers have been unsuccessful at finding a cure. However, we may be about to witness a breakthrough.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: From Wasteland to Motherland: Central Asia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey through Central Asia, Russia and the Ukraine, and listen to the songs and stories of people who are longing to return to the homelands of their distant memories.

Clip.Title: THE NORTH POLE CONSPIRACY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Who was the first man to reach the North Pole? Join the in-depth investigation into one of the great historical controversies of the 20th Century.

Clip.Title: LINCOLN'S WASHINGTON AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Washington, D.C. in 1861. The Civil War is at the doorstep and the city is bracing for disaster. America is a country torn in two. An untested President Lincoln strives to make the nation's capital the political center of the Union, but finds he is surrounded by Southern sympathies and under constant threat of attack.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Heading Northwest from the ferry terminal at British Columbia's Horseshoe Bay, the Sunshine Coast is an incredible journey - featuring world famous mountain ranges, forest landscapes - and iconic towns and settlements

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: A SHOT TO SAVE THE WORLD
Clip.Episode: A Shot To Save The World
Clip.EpisodeSummary: It was 1952, and polio had reached outbreak levels in America. There was no known cause, no cure, and no help in sight for parents desperate to protect their children. Our nation's hope was placed in a 33-year-old scientist, working from a basement lab in Pittsburgh. His name was Jonas Salk, and in just a few years, he would bring infantile paralysis to its knees and change the course of medical history. Travel back to a world gripped in fear and see how Dr. Salk, with his dedicated staff, a young charity, and a faithful nation, came together to conquer polio.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
